item.title: The Zakat Fund in the UAE uses social media to inform and engage with the public
item.description:
To enhance public understanding of zakat and promote transparency, the UAE’s Zakat Fund is leveraging social media to engage with the public. According to H.H Abdullah ibn Aqeedah Al Muhairy, Secretary-General of the Zakat Fund, the organization is utilizing platforms like Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, and Google+. This allows the public to stay informed about current activities and initiatives, and provides an avenue for inquiries, announcements, and feedback.
